Игра создавалась, как мод для игры Half-Life и быстро завоевала популярность. Тысячи игровых клубов и сотни тысяч игроков играли в Counter-Strike. Игра стала использоваться для проведения киберспортивных состязаний и турниров. Динамичные перестрелки, огромный выбор реально существующего оружия и бесконечный драйв! Counter-Strike Source предлогает всё то же, но с более качественной графикой, крутыми спецэффектами и новой физикой доступной благодара движку Source. Возмите в руки оружие и покажите, кто здесь главный!

i started to enjoy it more when i started using my microphone to issue commands!

I love this game. I mean, true, I don't play it anymore, but when you get into the feel of the game, it is just incredible. Don't jump in expecting your CoD graphics and crappy gameplay. This game is unique (apart from the others in the series (don't worry about them, just play this)) so just go and buy it. Now. Go. Buy it. Seriously. Do it.
Always a classic. i love it

best first person shooter on pc

Damn fun! Addictive as hell too. The bots are smart and challenging, the visuals have held up as well, and the gameplay is incredibly fine tuned for fast and fluid combat, exactly like a great FPS should be. There are plenty of weapons, something for everyone, and fun gadgets and more to use. The hostage and bomb defusal maps are great, simple to learn but fun to replay over and over to master.

But this is Counter Strike: Source I'm talking about, you should already know all that. If not, buy this piece of authoritive gaming history and see how a proper FPS game is meant to be made. You won't regret the purchase I promise! Try this with some friends and prepare for a fun night, or play it when bored with some bots.
I use it mainly for textures in g-mod but I do enjoy playing gun game once in a while. I would definitely reccomend buying it if you have the money. 10/10
